document.body:
If You're Looking For A Revolutionary Way To Slim And Tone Your Calf Muscles, You Can't Miss Out On This Important Announcement…
Warning: A Shocking 99% Of Diet And Exercise Plans Actually WIDEN Your Calves
This Proves Disastrous for Anyone Looking To Slim And Tone Their Calf Muscles!
Dear Friend,
It’s a problem that millions of men and women face, but it’s not one that’s often talked about – and for that reason, it’s nearly impossible to find the information needed to overcome it. I’m talking about large calf muscles. Whether you developed your large calves from genetics, weight gain, or even through a lifetime of physical activity, you’ll find slimming them down is nearly impossible!
You try to hide your calves under pants or long skirts, but that doesn’t solve the problem – only covers it. While others may have their theories as to why you don’t wear shorts in the summer, or tend to shield your legs behind something when you’re in your swimsuit, only you know the true embarrassment you feel from having large calves.
I can relate to your situation. I too have struggled with large calves. My name is Sara Marie James. Some of you may know me as the creator of TimeForTheNewYou.com but most of you don’t know that my background as a dancer resulted in strong, bulky calves that I spent most of my life hiding behind floor length dresses and long pants. I just couldn’t feel as feminine as I wanted to.
I spent years and hundreds of dollars on a solution to make my embarrassingly large calf muscles smaller even looking into options like smaller calves surgery, but…
Unfortunately…
Most fitness programs, while effective at burning fat and building muscle, tend to result in making your calf muscles wider and larger and surgery is just too expensive and too dangerous. For those of us who have a hard time looking at our calves in the mirror in the first place, this is completely unacceptable!
It’s because of this that I teamed up with a world-class nutritionist and fitness expert to uncover, once and for all, the…
Secrets To Smaller Calves
I designed this program for everyone who has ever been ashamed to show their calves in public (or even in private). It’s time for you to finally take control over the one part of your body you thought you’d never be able to change.
I developed Secrets To Smaller Calves because I want you to…
STOP wearing jeans in the summer STOP feeling self-conscious STOP feeling ashamed STOP draping your beach towel over your legs on the way to the pool
AND
START wearing the clothes YOU want to wear – whether it’s tighter jeans, shorts, swimsuits, dresses, skirts, or even lingerie…it’s time for you to show off your sleek, sexy new calves!
Secrets To Smaller Calves is an informative, no-fluff approach to giving you the sexy, slimmer calves you’ve always wanted. This 53 page guide is divided into six chapters covering a broad spectrum of topics, from the most effective calf -toning workouts (that only take minutes a day), to massage techniques that actually slim your calves, and even including the mouthwatering meals that will supercharge your workouts and help you see results up to 5x faster than you would with traditional diets and much more!
Let me ask you…
How Much Would You Pay For Calves You Couldn’t Wait To Show Off?
I can’t answer that question–only you can. What I CAN tell you, is how much you WON’T have to pay for the calves you’ve always dreamed of…
You WON’T have to pay hundreds of dollars for a personal trainer…
You WON’T have to pay outrageous gym membership fees…
AND
You WON’T have to pay nearly as much as this information is worth!
I’m prepared to offer Secrets To Smaller Calves to you for the low price of just…
Not $47
Not $37
Only $27!
Your Purchase Is Backed By My Iron-Clad 60 Day 100% Money Back Guarantee
My 60 Day 100% Money Back Guarantee I am so sure that once you secure your copy of Secrets To Smaller Calves , you’ll never want to let it go. That’s why I am proud to offer my 60 day, 100% money back guarantee. If you aren’t completely satisfied with your purchase, you have a full 60 days to return it for a full refund – no questions asked!
…as if a completely risk-free way to make your calves skinnier wasn’t irresistible enough, I’m going to take this deal to the next level!
Order Today And I’ll Throw In Not Just One…But FIVE Free Gifts
If you purchase Secrets To Smaller Calves today, I’ll include these amazing bonus guides that you’re sure to love!
Bonus #1 – How To Lose 14 Pounds In 14 Days
Conveniently, How To Lose 14 Pounds In 14 Days is divided into 14 chapters, all of which contain useful information that covers not only how to lose weight fast, but also how to keep it off, and addresses concerns not often covered by weight loss guides such as medical concerns and how certain surprising lifestyles changes can have a profound effect on how your body manages it’s weight.
Bonus #2 – How To Lose Fat Fast
How To Lose Fat Fast makes a great addition to Secrets To Smaller Calves , which is why I am excited to offer it as a bonus with your purchase. This book holds nothing back as it covers some of the most asked about topics in the subject of weight loss, such as metabolism, cravings, and even the most effective way to flatten your stomach.
Bonus #3 – 45 Fantastic Ways To Burn Calories
This book is essential reading if you’re looking for unique ways to lose weight without even realize you’re doing it – even while eating at your favorite fast food restaurant (see tip #6)! The title says it all… 45 Fantastic Ways To Burn Calories !
Bonus #4 – Top Diet Scams Revealed
If you’ve ever fallen victim to any of the hundreds of weight loss scams that are circulating the internet at any given time, you can’t miss this book. Inside Top Diet Scams Revealed , you’ll learn the how and why of the most popular scams out there and how you can avoid being the next victim of one.
Bonus #5 – Secrets Of Whiter Teeth
I couldn’t help but to add this one to the list of bonuses I’m offering. Why? Because I know once you see how amazing your calves look after just a few weeks with my program, you won’t be able to NOT smile…so why not have a gorgeous whiter smile to show off along with your sexy new SMALLER calves?
Don’t Miss Out On Your Chance To FINALLY Have The Skinny, Sleek, And Sexy Calves You’ve Always Wanted…And Take Advantage Of Over $137 Worth Of Exciting Bonuses At The Same Time!
To Your Slimmer Calves,
Sara Marie James
PS . Remember, even if you choose to return Secrets To Smaller Calves for a full refund, the five bonuses are yours to keep. What are you waiting for?
PPS. My program is unlike your typical diet/exercise program. Unlike most, my program is specifically designed to slim and tone your calf muscles. Whether your large calves are caused by genetics, excess weight, or a high level of fitness, this program will help you reshape your calves and give you the confidence to finally wear what YOU want to wear! *Consult a doctor before starting any new diet or exercise program.
